00154 class fastformat_exception
00155     : public std::runtime_error
00156 {
00157 public: // Member Types
00159     typedef std::runtime_error              parent_class_type;
00161     typedef fastformat_exception            class_type;
00163     typedef std::string                     multibyte_string_type;
00165     typedef std::basic_string<ff_char_t>    string_type;
00166 
00167 public: // Construction
00172     explicit fastformat_exception(char const* message)
00173         : parent_class_type(validate_message_(message))
00174     {
00175         FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00176     }
00177     virtual ~fastformat_exception() stlsoft_throw_0() = 0;
00178 
00179 private:
00181     class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00182 
00183 protected: // Implementation
00184 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION
00185     static ff_char_t const* validate_format_(ff_char_t const* format)
00186     {
00187         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_PRECONDITION_PARAMS_APPL_LAYER(NULL != format, "format parameter may not be null");
00188 
00189         FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00190 
00191         return format;
00192     }
00193     static ff_char_t const* validate_format_(ff_char_t const* format, size_t cchFormat)
00194     {
00195         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_PRECONDITION_PARAMS_APPL_LAYER((NULL != format || 0 == cchFormat), "format string pointer may not be null unless length is zero");
00196         STLSOFT_SUPPRESS_UNUSED(cchFormat);
00197 
00198         FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00199 
00200         return format;
00201     }
00202     static char const* validate_message_(char const* message)
00203     {
00204         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_PRECONDITION_PARAMS_APPL_LAYER(NULL != message, "message parameter may not be null");
00205 
00206         FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00207 
00208         return message;
00209     }
00210 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_DOCUMENTATION_SKIP_SECTION */
00211 };
00212 
00219     class format_parsing_exception
00220         : public fastformat_exception
00221     {
00222     public: // Member Types
00224         typedef fastformat_exception                        parent_class_type;
00226         typedef format_parsing_exception                    class_type;
00228         typedef parent_class_type::multibyte_string_type    message_string_type;
00230         typedef parent_class_type::string_type              string_type;
00231 
00232     public: // Construction
00239         format_parsing_exception(char const* message, ff_parse_code_t code, ff_char_t const* format)
00240             : parent_class_type(validate_message_(message))
00241             , code(code)
00242             , format(validate_format_(format))
00243         {
00244             FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00245         }
00253         format_parsing_exception(char const* message, ff_parse_code_t code, ff_char_t const* format, size_t cchFormat)
00254             : parent_class_type(validate_message_(message))
00255             , code(code)
00256             , format(validate_format_(format, cchFormat), cchFormat)
00257         {
00258             FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00259         }
00260         virtual ~format_parsing_exception() stlsoft_throw_0() = 0;
00261     private:
00263         class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00264 
00265     public: // Attributes
00267         const ff_parse_code_t   code;
00269         const string_type       format;
00270     };

00276         class illformed_format_exception
00277             : public format_parsing_exception
00278         {
00279         public: // Member Types
00281             typedef format_parsing_exception        parent_class_type;
00283             typedef illformed_format_exception      class_type;
00285             typedef parent_class_type::string_type  string_type;
00286 
00287         public: // Construction
00294             illformed_format_exception(char const* message, ff_parse_code_t code, ff_char_t const* format)
00295                 : parent_class_type(message, code, format)
00296             {
00297                 FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00298             }
00306             illformed_format_exception(char const* message, ff_parse_code_t code, ff_char_t const* format, size_t cchFormat)
00307                 : parent_class_type(message, code, format, cchFormat)
00308             {
00309                 FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00310             }
00311         private:
00313             class_type& operator =(class_type const&);

00326     class mismatched_replacements_exception
00327         : public fastformat_exception
00328     {
00329     public: // Member Types
00331         typedef fastformat_exception                parent_class_type;
00333         typedef mismatched_replacements_exception   class_type;
00335         typedef parent_class_type::string_type      string_type;
00336 
00337     public: // Construction
00345         explicit mismatched_replacements_exception(char const* message, ff_replacement_code_t code, int numberOfReplacements, int firstMismatchedReplacementIndex)
00346             : parent_class_type(validate_message_(message))
00347             , code(code)
00348             , numberOfReplacements(numberOfReplacements)
00349             , firstMismatchedReplacementIndex(firstMismatchedReplacementIndex)
00350         {
00351             FASTFORMAT_COVER_MARK_ENTRY();
00352         }
00353         virtual ~mismatched_replacements_exception() stlsoft_throw_0() = 0;
00354     private:
00356         class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00357 
00358     public: // Attributes
00360         const ff_replacement_code_t     code;
00362         const int                       numberOfReplacements;
00364         const int                       firstMismatchedReplacementIndex;
00365     };
